page.title: 12 Mr Seward's farm
page.content:
Mr Seward has one of the largest farms in Silverton; it has 278 acres. He breeds a mixture of sheep and cattle. He grows cereal crops of barley and wheat.
He produces all the food for his animals. In the summer he feeds them on grass while in the winter he feeds the cattle hay and the sheep roots.
He has three tractors, one combine, one baler, trailers and cultivating implements. He employs two farm workers.
The main kinds of farming in Silverton are corn growing and livestock with some dairy farming.
